name: Austin Hodge
summary: Software Developer with extensive experience in designing, implementing, and maintaining web applications, focusing on modern development patterns, best practices, and enhanced user experiences.

experience.title: Software Developer
responsibilities: Overhauled ASP.NET application with modern development patterns into a Blazor web app.
Designed and implemented requested functionality while consulting with a team to deliver the best UX.
Implemented best practices for code review, git, and automation for improved development efficiency.

experience.title: Software Developer
responsibilities: Designed application layouts and data structures for clients.
Developed angular applications with tailwind to deliver an AWS hosted MVPs.

experience.title: Software Developer
responsibilities: Created a dynamic angular web app with thousands of settings interacting to create a client-tailored UI.
Built upon ASP.NET Web API and SQL infrastructure to support enhancements for the web application.
Implemented E2E and unit tests to increase application stability and maintainability.

experience.title: Software Developer
responsibilities: Developed REST APIs with node.js, typescript, express, and mongodb to fulfill client deliverables.
Built purpose-driven reusable components to be used across multiple applications.
Designed and developed functionality dealing with maps, authentication, sessions, forms, state, etc.

experience.title: Front End Developer (contract)
responsibilities: Designed and implemented UI components to support desired functionality.
Refactored the application to be responsive for phones and tablets.
Integrated backend Java REST endpoints & authentication with angular web app.

experience.title: Front End Developer
responsibilities: Enhanced and added functionality to a custom CMS created by the company.
Worked with design consultant to create a frontend with maps, graphs, and other UI elements.

experience.title: Software Development Internship
responsibilities: Developed a chemical inventory system using python and SQLite with various integrated automations.
Create data visualiztions with data provided using javascript and D3.js.

volunteering.description: Gave a presentation about genetic algorithms and how they could be applied to UI.
Gave a presentation about how you could modularize javascript task runners.
